scripts.build: bun run build:core && bun run --filter '@gridcore/ui-core' build && bun run --filter '*' --filter '!@gridcore/core' --filter '!@gridcore/ui-core' build
scripts.build:wasm: cd gridcore-rs/gridcore-wasm && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg --no-opt && cp -r pkg/* ../../packages/ui-web/src/wasm/
scripts.build:rust: bun run build:wasm && bun run build:ui-core
scripts.test: bun test packages/core && bun test packages/ui-web/src
scripts.test:all: bun test packages/core && bun test packages/ui-web/src && bun run --cwd packages/ui-web test:e2e
scripts.test:rust: USE_RUST_CORE=true bun test packages/core && USE_RUST_CORE=true bun test packages/ui-web/src
scripts.test:all:rust: USE_RUST_CORE=true bun test packages/core && USE_RUST_CORE=true bun test packages/ui-web/src && bun run --cwd packages/ui-web test:e2e:rust
